mapper.insert: insert into persons (name, gender, age, ID_code, ID_code_cut, sn_in_center, email, relative, tel1, tel2, global_sn, idcenter) values (#{name}, #{gender}, #{age}, #{ID_code}, #{ID_code_cut}, #{sn_in_center}, #{email}, #{relative}, #{tel1}, #{tel2}, #{global_sn}, #{idcenter});
mapper.update: update persons set name=#{name}, age=#{age}, gender=#{gender}, tel1=#{tel1}, email=#{email}, sn_in_center = #{sn_in_center}, global_sn = #{global_sn} where idperson=#{idperson}
mapper.select: select * from persons where ID_code=#{xxx} limit 1
select count(*) from persons where idcenter=#{xxx}
select * from persons where ID_code=#{0} and idcenter=#{1}
